```{r, load_data}
path <- "/Users/georgedalianis/Desktop/Gov 1005/finalprojectversion1/EIU-data/EIU_DataBySeries_20200228194092.xlsx"

EIU <- path %>%
  excel_sheets() %>%
  set_names() %>%
  map(read_excel, col_types = "text",
      path = path, skip=4)

str(EIU)

df <- bind_rows(EIU, .id = "column_label")
```
